content.detailedDescription:
Witness called into dispatch, has no access to computer at this time, dispatch took report for witness: 
dispatcher: steve cox

witness: ryan and josh (ryans cousin)

location uper peniscala, lives right near the water, of main route

saw 13 ufo���s 6 large ships
4 smaller crafts, blue and white, stayed in constant formation, like escorts for larger crafts, went from one horizon to the other in 1 second

4 huge rings ring���s with crafts flying out of the ring, multiple colors, seems to float up and up high in the sky and disappeared watch for atleast 30 minutes

3 saucer shaped crafts went about a mile a second, stopped hovered and seem to land in lake michigan, ran down street to seem them but they were gone, called his cousin who was driving near the lake and saw them in the bay between michigan and wisconsin.

witness estimates at least 30 crafts in the air at one time, the sky was filed with crafts.

none of these crafts made a sound, moved in all directions

witness didn���t see it but swears they landed on earth or in the water.

number of crafts went directly over his head no more than a ��� mile above him. states it looked like they were shooting missiles.

seemed like military action with formation, cousin saw 3 larger crafts 1 red, with blue crafts next to it, and 2 large crafts staying in constant formation with red craft, would change, positions, one would move up to front point the other would drop to the rear.

closest craft got between 800-1000 feet from witness

would like to show his drawings to an investigator,

dr. stephen cox
mufon dispatch
star team
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw 13 ufo’s 6 large ships

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i went to the parking lot to have a smoke break.  it was about 400 am in the morning as we worked night shift.  a front was coming in and it was windy, low clouds moving briskly and cold.  as we stood there smoking our cigaretts, i happed to look past my friends as i saw something moving in the area over the rail yards behind our docks.  at the time it looded to me as a giant foil pillow ballow that you buy, but it was at least 25 feet in diameter.  it was about 600 ft above the lights of the railroad yard, and it was moving in a erratic slow pace as it was fighing the windy conditions.  but then it stopped short of the post office parking lot,changed directions and moved south toward the union terminal.  we watched as it moved toward the terminal, it then stopped directly behind the terminal, as it started to ascend straight up and through the low flying clouds .  we lost sight of it as it entered the clouds, but then the clouds lite up as if the object must have turned into a bright lite.  at this point all we could see was a bright lite through the clouds.  it then reversed direction and traveled directly into the oncoming wind, we watched the illuminated light travel mybe three quarters of a mile back against the wind, it stopped and then started moving directly towards us.  we then got scared and started walking briskly back to the steps of the loading dock.  as we hit the loading dock steps we stopped and looked up at the approaching light, it was almost straight overhead,  i could make a visual sighting of a outline of the lighted object and i noticed that there were three small red lights on the bottom as it passed overhead.  scared and shaken i mumbled to my friend (what the hell was that} as we walked onto the dock he said back to me {you know what it was}.  we told a few friend was we saw, but i didn't say to much to anybody i did't know to well.
content.summary: Spotted bright metallic object over railroad yard behind post office truck terminal.

content.detailedDescription: Was at work since i work third shirt. went outside for my break to have a cigarette.  my coworker was standing outside too and said, "sarah, look at that light!"  i looked up towards the left and saw a very large white light.  you could tell it was very high up and was not making any noises.  it was moving fast and in a straight line.  no lights were blinking on it like on aircrafts.  was almost perfectly circular but the bottom of it looked like it had a little line of light that extended from the main mass. but was very small in comparision to the ball of light. i also about 10 minutes later saw a shooting star but that was obvious, esp since i have seen those before. this was completely different. moving in straight line, fast but still took maybe three minutes until i lost sight of it as the building blocked its path.  did not appear to blink or twinkle or any flickering.  my first thought was maybe the space station? but each time i've seen that it was much higher and smaller and dimmer.  this was very big in comparison to all the stars up there. largest light in the sky but it was very high up and must have been very large to still look so big. now thats it over i keep thinking about it and picturing it in my head. i have never witnessed anything looking like that and i have a telescope and star watch quite frequently. don't really have much belief in ufo's but this has got me wondering.  going to research to see if there were any meteors or satellites or even the space station overhead tonight.
content.summary: Large white light in sky moving in straight line, very high and very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
On april 3, 2009 at 23.40 i was in my car waiting at traffic lights in via galiani, in naples.
the road (via galiani) the street is perpendicular to the sea, so the look was turned towards the hill.
you could not see stars or the moon. the wind was calm.
i looked up to sky and saw many fireballs out of the clouds. some, after a few seconds, fell in the clouds hiding from view.
have seen the fireballs also my wife and daughter who were traveling by car with me.
i have seen other people who were parked at the lights as i find out what were those balls.
i exchanged information with two people that i have the phone number.
we were unable to explain what those objects were flying.
the balls were moving from the north-west to north-east, they were faster than the clouds that seemed to have stopped.
objects had spherical shape and were red. outlines were not well delineated, like a real ball of fire.
i talked with people stopped at traffic lights and their first impression was that they were ufo.
have passed dozens of fireballs, then passed the emotion, i took the phone and i took a picture with a nokia n96.
items disappearing right in my view because it passed over a building that covered the view of the sky. new objects appeared on the left hand and continued to fly.
10 minutes after the objects have disappeared completely.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dozens of balls of light that hover in and out of the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I drive to miami every couple of months. i live in clearwater and i usually drive back at night. i have to drive through the everglades to get over to the other side of florida. if you have never been through there then i will tell you its pitch dark when there���s no other cars around. if i remember correctly i drove down there in the end of december maybe the beginning of jan. i was just driving there and back. i just moved to clearwater from there and was getting the rest of my things. it had to be like 12:30 on a friday or sat night. i remember it was a weekend so at that time there were no other cars driving in the everglades b/c everybody has already made it to their destination for the weekend. so i was driving and it was really foggy but right above not even a hundred feet up is this object with huge big lights. i have never seen lights this big and i have never seen lights that had a glow like this. as i drove under it i was kinda in shock but then i watched it in my rearview mirror it was still sitting in the same spot hovering. it was not moving at all. i don���t know of any aircraft on this planet that sits in one spot like that. 
now this time i was driving home this past mo nday around 1 am so i guess you could say tuesday. and what do you know i see the same freaking object but this time i really seen it! it was on the other side of the road and it was hovering again. i know i am not crazy and this time i almost had a heart attack! at this point i don���t really care what anyone thinks. what are the chances to see that even once and i seen it twice. im telling you i am so scared to drive through there ever again. i had to drive over 100 mph to get out of there as soon as i could just so i felt safe. i was about 40 mins into the everglades both times. its really scary because your phones don���t work out there and there are never any cops out there its just you and the everglades. but i will tell you its real what i saw. and this time the object was brave it didnt care who seen it. it was hovered over the road and this time there where cars on the road and they all where driving right underneath it. i mean i guess you could just drive under it but im sure if you seen it when your driving that fast you might not pay attention. but i know someone else had to of seen this if i seen it twice. i have never seen anything else like it ever. have you had anyone else say anything about the everglades? please let me know if you have becasue my sister and my boyfriend think i am very crazy or that i am making it up or that it was a plane or a chopper but it wasnt in any way. im glad i seen your documentary on tv becasue you really dont know what to do when you see something like that.
content.summary: Blue lights and hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I went to sydney on my holidays and visited the sydney tower, i took a lot of pictures with my camera .When i started to watching them i had notice theres something unusual in just only one photo, so i been thinking in all the posibilities at the moment i take the photo, and all the other pictures looks normal, so here is the photo, i put my name if you dont believe me, anyway let me know if you think is an ufo.
content.summary: The object looks like a disc with yellows lights

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my driveway and looked out in the distance towards richland, wa.  i saw a bright star-like object that seemed to move from left to right in a rapid motion.  the star-like object was over richland, wa.  the object began to move foreward towards pasco, wa in the direction of my house in a very swift and fast movement.  as the object got closer to flying over my house i could not hear any engines or helicopter blades coming from the oject.  the object then flew over my house at an altitude of approx. 29,000 ft.  i lost sight of the object as it flew into the horizon.  the object had not strobing or flashing lights like a plane or helicopter would.  it did not make any noise.
content.summary: Saw star-like object move at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling west on miami county road 500 s. as i approached ind state rd 19 i noticed an orange ball-like light to the west at around 20-25 degrees elevation and maybe 3-5 degrees to the south of my position. i at first thought it was really big for a star. i then thought maybe it was an aircraft from grissom arb. both thoughts were negated as it wasn't twinkling or strobing. after viewing for 4-5 seconds or more the orange object faded out. another 4-5 seconds passed and the orange object turned back on for maybe another good 5 seconds at which time it faded back out not to reappear.
this object was low in the sky and not very far to my front. this all transpired in less than a mile from the intersection of 500 s/in 19 and 500s/250 e. it was no flares or grissom kc135s. the object was also traveling west.
content.summary: Witnessed orange object fade off then on then off again

content.detailedDescription:
I cannot yet provide a specific date as i was very young but i am working on narrowing this down a bit.  i am currently located in oregon but will be back in indiana around early october, where the incident originally occurred.  

i remember playing just outside the house on the patio while my mother was in the adjacent kitchen.  i was not allowed to wander too far if she was not with me.  i saw a white-ish/metallic "airplane" as i knew it then, because anything in the sky was an airplane at that age.  i don't know where it came from or how long it had been there observing me if it in fact was.  it made no sound so i only noticed it when it became very close.  linear distance from me was probably around 100ft away and the height at which it was hovering was maybe only 20-feet above a large tree in the neighbors yard that it passed directly over.  i recall being fascinated by this because at that age i was afraid of the loud sound airplane and jet engines made and would always run inside or hide next to my parents when a traditional aircraft flew near of any sort.  this craft made no sound, literally no sound, so i was happy to be able to watch an "airplane" up close for the very first time.  i wasn't frightened at all and enjoyed the event.

as it continued at what i would say was a brisk walking pace it eventually crossed over the rural road and continued over an open field.  at that time i saw what i remember to be a ball-shaped object fall from the bottom of the craft and land in the field.  it fell at about the speed any object that was dropped would fall, no slower or faster than gravity.  i moved towards the ball and do not again remember seeing the craft unfortunately, i think i was fixated on picking up part of the "airplane".  i know this was real and not a dream or otherwise because to this day i remember the feeling of anxiety in my stomach, not from the object but from crossing the road by myself, something i was never allowed to do at that age, not even to get the mail.  i realized i wasn't supposed to cross the road but my curiosity was overwhelming.  i easily found it, walked up and leaned down to see it closer but have no further recollection of the object and only remember being back on the patio after an unknown amount of time, tho i know it wasn't much later because it wasn't noticeably darker and my mother wasn't worried about me.  i believe i was very young because i knocked on the glass door rather than open it myself, and when my mother slid it open i anxiously told her i saw an airplane and part of it came off.  she humored me for a moment and brought me inside and the event was forgotten.

the craft itself was very smooth, i consider it an oval or ellipse, but i have never seen another image of a craft like this one in any ufo shows or photos i have seen.  i say it was different because it had what i later associated as looking most like an antennae mast from an aircraft carrier.  if you haven't seen one of those, it's a large antennae array with many smaller pieces sticking out in all directions, jumbled and looking somewhat unorganized which contrasted with the otherwise smooth and sleek profile of the object.

later i had several experiences seeing silhouetted figures in my bedroom door way, and on one occasion i know i tried to scream out to my parents only to feel the attempt being made, but no sound was coming out.  i then passed out, or fell asleep somehow.  the second time i saw a figure was just the silhouette but this time it didn't scare me for some reason and i was much older, probably a teenager.  i just stared at it as it faced me, then again fell asleep quickly for whatever reason.

i never thought much of this until one night in my 20's when a friend of a friend asked if i ever saw ufo's or aliens and i said "no", but said that i would give anything if i could have since both of my sisters had sightings in their lives.  he further questioned if i ever saw any object of any sort or person i couldn't explain which instantly reminded me of these events that had long been forgotten as trivial.  suddenly, through the scope of adulthood, i realized no airplane looks or behaves like that craft, and when questioned, my parents had no explanation for the figures in the house.

i apologize for not leaving my full details as of yet, but i am unclear as to who the "third parties" are that may contact me with my approval.  i would be willing to provide more detail upon clarification and i authorize mufon to contact me directly at the email address provided for said clarification, thank you.  in fact, i would welcome information to help me solve this lifelong riddle.  my sisters may be willing to provide their stories as well, but that would be up to them.  i plan to question my parents if they ever had any sightings when i return to indiana.  i will be residing in the house where the incident happened when i do get back.

i did find a drawing i made later in life of the craft as i was packing, but it is likely in a moving box at present and i won't have access to it again until october when i complete my move.
content.summary: Slow, low flying craft that made no sound passed then dropped an object that i approached.

content.detailedDescription: I was out filming the lightning and strikes then i seen a white light come from in the clouds and i filmed it as it went into a straigt line toward the direction of san bernardino east of my location. at the same time i took a picture of it with my digital camera.When it came from within the clouds it like shot out fast toward the ground and it leveled out it went slow.I filmed until it dissapeared.I felt excited and showed my family.
content.summary: Seen ufo come from the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this off my back porch today.  i thought it might be a couple of balloons, and it might be, but the thing stayed in the exact same spot for about twenty minutes before moving north.  sorry for the shaky camera, it's tough to focus when you're zooming that far and i didn't have a tripod.  no sound, so i didn't record any.
content.summary: Two white spheres rotating around each other

content.detailedDescription:
To: james carrion - mufon international director


from: kenton lee fisher - investigative journalist


re: the scientific evidence you may have been looking for.



dear mr. carrion

my research has caused me to cross paths with someone who i highly recommend that you get in touch with.    he is a russian scientist (now based in new york), who���s research seems to have culminated in producing conclusive evidence that not only explains things like the star child skull, cattle mutilations, human abductions, ���ancient astronaut��� questions, etc., but can also connect the dots and fill in the remaining gaps relating to the entire ufo/uso phenomenon.    according to him, not only are ���they��� walking among us today, but they (ets) have been living among us in a hybrid humanoid form for quite some time;   and their ulterior motives are apparently not in the ultimate best interests of humans as a species.    among other things, he is the author of a research paper titled ���save the human species���, and he has been trying to produce a documentary film (intended for american cinema), that would divulge all the evidence that he has uncovered.    unfortunately, he has come up against some seemingly insurmountable barriers in the production of his documentary film, and i fear that (for geo-political reasons), even if it were to be completed, he would meet with extremely stiff resistance when trying to release it to the cinema circuits (or even tv media) here in the u.S.    oddly enough however, abc television will soon be airing a sci-fi  thriller movie on tv that is primarily based on the facts related to his findings.    in any event, he is beginning to lose heart for his project, and is now skeptical that he will even find anyone who is credible and respected on this subject (here in the states), to even view his material - not to mention support it.    nevertheless, i believe that collaboration between the two of you would be mutually beneficial, and i have included his personal bio and contact info below.            


as i���m sure a person of your common sense, deductive reasoning, and logical intellect already knows, the ���official��� story we were given by our government about the events of september 11, 2001 was nothing but lies intended to cover up what really took place that day, and the real motives behind it.    as an independent researcher, investigative journalist, and freelance author, i (along with about 100 other fellow 9/11 truth seeking colleagues around the world) have been comparing notes for the past 8 years, and can now prove beyond a shadow of a doubt that 9/11 was a multi-national covert inter-governmental conspiracy (that was about 25 years in the making) - and was not perpetrated by a bunch of bare-footed cave-dwelling goat-herding moslems (led by a crippled 6' tall one who was actually dragging around a kidney dialysis machine in tow at the time), contrary to what we were told!    the only problem is that, due to the financial/political/influential forces working behind the scenes (and the logistical controls held by the real perpetrators), it has proved almost impossible to bring our fact findings of the real truth to the general public, in an effective widely accessible format that would expose the underlying plot to the american masses, ample enough to spur the wheels of real justice into motion.    the biggest problem is that the real perpetrators have been acting under the disguise of being major friends and allies of the u.S.;   and in recent decades, members of their organization have infiltrated so much of our society that they now control most of our media - and regulate its content.    


while we in the 9/11 truth movement are now prepared to present overwhelming evidence of just exactly ���who done it��� (as they are commonly known, in ���earthly��� terms), and why they did it (from an ���earthly��� perspective),... obtaining a massive public forum from which to present our evidence has thus far been illusive.    while the powers that be currently maintain full control over our network tv, radio, and newspaper media; they don���t yet own all of the book publishing companies, nor have they yet gotten a complete handle on the internet.    while the later two venues still offer an outlet for such controversial material to see the light of day, only about half of the american public has the ability to access it, or the propensity to seek it.    i personally will soon be releasing 5 books that break 9/11 down into 5 relatively easy-to-digest categories:  (a comprehensive expansive time-line of related events, a book of quotes and other official admissions, a book containing more than 1000 questions that were side-lined by the 9/11 commission, a book presenting documented evidence and scientific facts that conflict directly with the official story, and a book outlining the motives of many of the major players - stopping short of mentioning any possible et affiliations *for obvious reasons*), but i fear that these books will fall into too few hands to do any significant good.    


be that as it may, the reason why i wrote to you is not to debate this issue, but rather because one of my recent colleagues has shown new light on this subject that seems to be much more in your ball park than in mine, as his evidence seems to indicate very strongly that, while the 9/11 truth research network has nailed down the international group who was really responsible for most such atrocities throughout our history, we still had no idea exactly who (or perhaps ���what���) these entities really were.    


according to my russian colleague, ���they��� are in fact hybrid alien humanoids of extra-terrestrial origin, who have been steadily and secretly evolving among us for centuries.     


obviously, i���m not about to go anywhere near mentioning that in any of my books, for three reasons.    first of all, it is going to be hard enough for most mainstream americans to swallow the fact that a supposed long-time friend of our nation was actually just using us for evil purposes the entire time, and caused elements within our government to attack our own country - let alone sugesting to them that these imposters are also ets!    secondly, except for the proof recently offered by my russian colleague, i found no previous evidence that suggested any such thing, and consequently have no other previous documentation to support it - possibly because none of the rest of us were ever specifically looking for it.    and third, from a prosecutorial standpoint, the ancestral origin of a criminal element should have no baring on the preponderance of evidence against that criminal element, nor the prosecution, conviction, and punishment sentencing thereof.    however, this does not mean that this is an insignificant matter (actually, quite to the contrary), but swift accurate justice would certainly be hampered (if not totally avoided) if we in the rest of the 9/11 truth community began to prepare a prosecution case based along those lines at this early stage.        


while his evidence appears to be quite solid, i will also admit that much of it is in areas of science that are a bit above my paygrade - so to speak.    because of my inability to fully comprehend some of the science behind his findings, and due to my reluctance to publicize it in my efforts to spur the convening of a new and totally truly independent 9/11 investigation (unhampered by anything that might be construed as being ridiculous or ���outlandish���), i will be of no significant help to my russian colleague - but you might be !


the name of this researcher is dr. vladimir gouliaev, and his credentials and biography are all linked below.     i���m sure that you and your staff will find his material to be at least quite interesting, and hopefully enlightening and compelling as well.    i also think that you and your team will have a better understanding of the parts of his findings that i am not yet able to comprehend.    please contact him at your earliest convenience to make arrangements to review his evidence, as he will be expecting to hear from you.    telephone, email, and snail-mail contact info are all listed below.    if you have any questions, or if i can be of any further assistance, please feel free to call me any time at:   (610)-935-7321 , or simply send your inquiries to me at my return email address.


thank you for your time,
respectfully,
kent fisher.



information on dr. g.


 
1. my biography: 
http://www.Yourhealth911.Com/dr_g_music/dr_g_biography.Html 


2. snail-mail: 
dr. vladimir gouliaev
458 neptune ave., #11 f 
brooklyn, ny 11224 


3. phone (office):
(718) 265-7163 


4. see also:
http://www.Yourhealth911.Com/index.Html 


regards,

dr. g.
content.summary: Genetic proof and other scientific evidence of ets.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on i40 at 300am in the morning looked out windsheild and i saw a triangle shape object in the sky it was large on the rear two corners i saw lights changing colors from white to a greenish color when one  light was white the other was green and they changed to the other coloor iwatched it tell it went behind the mountains iwas driving with a freind to a.S.U. i know it was 300am because my friends mother called him on his cell phone at the same time i think it was a militry project
content.summary: Large dark triaangle shape lights on rear corners changing from white to greenish color

content.detailedDescription:
I know that this is a widely covered event and you probably have more than enough accounts for your investigation, but i wanted to add mine in the hope that maybe you had found an answer to what it was in the sky that night. even though it took place over 13 years ago it stills resonates in my head as if it happened yesterday. i have searched for a solid answer to no avail. any way here is my story.

 myself and two friends were driving down lincoln blvd. heading west at about 20th street. at that point i caught a large group of lights out of the right corner of my eye. i said to the other two people in my car "do you guys see that?" at which they responded "yes!" i slowed the car down and made a right onto 18th street which is a dead end road. there were several other cars pulled on to the street with the people outside of their vehicles and looking up. myself and my two passengers jump out of my truck and looked up as well. the object that i saw was huge. bigger than anything i had ever seen in the sky before or since. it was a boomerang/ diamond shape with lights at each point. the lights were bright like baseball field lights. everybody stood there silent just staring with the occasional "what is that?" being muttered. the strangest part was that it made absolutly no noise. i am not a rocket scientist but anything the length of two or more football fiels propell itself through the air should at the very least make some sort of sound. but there was nothing. after about 30-35 seconds there was great big "woosh" sound and the lights immediatly went out. the after glow from the lights lasted for about 5 seconds, like after a camera flash blinds you. then all you could see was the sillouette of the object. still heading in the same direction towards the north edge of squaw peak to a place called dreamy draw. dreamy draw is now the place that state route 51 runs to the north part of the valley. it never picked up speed which i approximate at 40-50 mph. it finally disappeared behind the north slope of squaw peak. everybody at that point got in their cars and simply drove away. my friends and i talk about it all night with each other. it wasn't until later on, maybe a month later were even heard abot the phoenix lights. the pictures that they printed in the paper and the video the news broadcasted were not the lights that i saw that night. not even close. there was a woman in town, a doctor, that made a documentry of the phoenix lights event. i went to go see it but she made it into some spiritual encounter that we all took part in. for me it was something unexplainable. and it has racked every bit of logic that i have in my body. anyway if you have any answers i would greatly appreciate them. and vice versa if you have any more questions for me please ask.

thank you for your time,
preston brown
content.summary: The phoenix lights event but not the flares seen in the the south western part of the city.

content.detailedDescription: Going trough riverton wyo at around 4 am in morning looked up seen what i no was a ufo there is nothing on earth that looked like it i am only writeing this now because i seen something that might looked like what i seen on your show or a show about you what i seen was made up of a bunch of pink lights something like the kids play lights that are fiber optics the ones that look like a bunch of fish lines the light goes through and looks like a bunch of lights at the ends of the lines i watched this for about 5 min it was all over the space of about 10 miles and as close as 1 to 2 miles away then it was gone and i have never had a problem telling my friends what i have seen but untell i seen what could have been something close to what i seen on ufos over earth show i never told anyone like you before but seeing what i did made me feel like i had to maybe back up someone else story or have something to back up mine
content.summary: Left casino going through riverton going home seen this pink thing pulled over watched

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from doctors my girlfriend noticed a silver shaped object flying along side of us.She told me to look  over there there was a ufo.At first when i looked over i didn,t see anything.She said keep looking it went behind a tree line.Sure enough as soon as the tree line opend up there was a silve or peuter object egg shaped just hovering a bout a quaterof amile above the tree line.It sat there hovering there people in the car in front of us slowed down and were looking up at the same object there were no windows doors or engines and no sound comming from the object.It felt like we were being observed i told my girlfriend to keep going.Itried to repot it last year but the web sight wouldn,t take it
content.summary: Beat up sivler or peuter egg shaped object that looked ancient very old looking

content.detailedDescription: I was 12 yrs old and had a good friend of mine spending the night with me. we went to walk to the neighborhood corner store that evening. we were only about 2 blocks from my house, when i looked back right behind us and seen a ufo. it was very low to the ground literally just above the tree line and during the few seconds we was looking at it, it was perfectly still!! when we both realized what it was we both started to panic and turned back toward my house and ran. when we got to my house my mother and step-father was sitting outside on the porch. we ran all the way and asked them did they see that... my step-father say's see what?  i said a ufo!! he sarcasticly said yes. but later admited they seen nothing, they thought we were screwing around i guess. my mother said we were gone for much longer than we whould have been and thats why they were waiting outside. i cant even begin to say how long we were gone but it was almost dark out when we got home and we only walked 2 blocks from my house. we really didnt have any in depth discussion about what we seen about that until about 5 yrs later. infact i guess over time i even started to second guess what we seen until we had talked about again years later. now i am 30 yrs old and have another strange story to tell you about. about 3 yrs ago, i went to the dr. because my shoulder was bothering me. they took an x-ray and when the dr. came in to look at the x-rays with me, he said something very strange to me. he said exactly this to me.. "i have a question to ask you and you dont have to tell me if you dont want to, but what is this?" he pointed to the x-ray at a round quarter shaped thing in my arm. i looked at it and said "i have no idea, you tell me" then he acted strangely like i didnt wanna tell him or something and didnt say anything else about it. it took some time for me to digest what i saw and when i told my mother about my appointment she mentioned the ufo inciedent. i think its a lil far fetched but i would like to know what possiably could be in my arm. very strange!!
content.summary: It was a disc shape with lights on the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
We had gone to miami for a meeting and took our children. on the way home,
i was driving into the night and everyone in the car was asleep.  
we were coming to a overpass-and i saw something in the road and i kept trying to figure out what it was and i was driving about 70 miles per hour and i started slowing down because i could not see what it was-then all of a sudden i slammed on the brakes because i saw 4 alien beings-
they were moving in a straight line from one side of the highway going to the other side. (there was 2 tall ones and 2 much shorter ones)  it looked like they had on a one piece skin tight outfit that even went over their heads. when i slammed on my brakes they all turned their heads toward the car and vanished. they all had oval heads with large eyes.  i saw something out of the corner of my eye on the other side of the road and it was gone.  maybe like a flash.
my family picked themselves up off the floor and asked what was going on and i told them. they made fun of me and i had tried to dismiss it, but i know what i saw.
when we got back to richmond they asked that i not tell that story to anyone.  i did tell my pastor and he said no other beings could be on this earth, everyone else i told did not laugh but they did look at me really strange.  i have told a few people along the way, but not many.
about 5 years after that incident my husband and i went through roswell new mexico and i asked if we could go through the museum.  i was in total shock because i then knew that someone else had seen the same beings.
i was watching  the ufo show on tv today and the show was about a man who had been abducted.  his son and several others also saw the flying objects.I felt really bad for the man because the lie detector test was inconclusive. he said he was not sure he saw it, but he would stake his life on what he saw.  i understand that perfectly-you yourself do not 
want to believe it because no one believes you. once you have seen something like that it never goes away.
content.summary: 4 beings moving across interstate.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were at her parents house for mothers day weekend. we went out to her back porch at around 10 o'clock. i noticed a light in the sky and assumed it was a plane or helicopter. after looking at it for a minute or two, i noticed it moved up and down, and also left to right. for over half an hour it floated up and down, in and out of the low cloud cover, right beyond the treetops. it disappeared into the clouds for a few moments. we had gotten the camera out by this point; hoping for the object to return. it came back out of the cloud cover only a minute or two after it vanished. at this point my girlfriend took a couple photos. afterward, thinking we had only gotten a distant shots, just decided we were crazy and to deleted the pictures. however, a few remained and after a week or so, she was looking back over all the pictures that weekend. after zooming in on the 'white light' we saw this bluish-gray, metallic looking, 'emerald shaped' object, with a greenish-yellow orb around it. its absolutely shocking to see the amount of detail the picture shows.
content.summary: Floating light, multi-colored, hovering in a in a non-specific pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I had an old mobile home on a small plot of land, in the woods, located, near shawano, wisconsin, that i used as a vacation home, at the time. the long trailer would make noises as the wind would slightly move it and the brush outside would rub against it. when it would get dark there; it would get really dark. it was a little scary being there by myself. i used to turn on the tv and radio just to help mask the background noise. one night in july of 2005, i decided that i needed to go out someplace, where i would be with other people. i decided to go to a bar near birnmwood; which is about 40 miles from where i was staying. i did have a few drinks and i had a great time talking with other people. when it was close to closing time, i decided it was time to make the long trip back. i was heading east-bound on highway 29. at that time of night you have the road to yourself. you can set the cruise control at 65 mph and just drive. if your lucky, you may see one other car between west of wittenburg and shawano; about a 30 plus mile trip. even thou it gets dark up here, the moon must have been out that night; because it was light enough for me to see the object. about 5 miles east of wittenburg is when i encountered the object. when i first noticed the object, it was off to my left at windsheild height. it was about the size of a small car; i'm guessing about 10 feet long and 5 foot wide. it was a tan color, like a deer. i could not tell if it was a craft or animal. i knew that it was neither. as it looked like it was going to hit the car, i ducked down. it went over my hood and cleared the car. i slowed the car down and watched it travel over an open field, at the same height. as it went to my right the rectangual shape would change shape to an s-shape. it retained most of the retangular shape; but looked like a snake would look like as it moved over the ground. i was really shook up after it was gone. i had a good time at the bar that night and before this incident, i thought that i would go back the next night. it scared me so much that i didn't go back to the bar for about 3 months. i didn't tell too many people about what i saw that night; because the first thing that they would say to me is; how much did you have to drink? i did not want to become part of a joke. i did have a good friend that lived not too far away from where i saw the object. i told him some basic information; without telling him the whole account, at first. he told me that, at that time, for about the last two years, people saw strange sightings over the stepple of an old church on highway 29. this is where i saw the object. the open field is across from the church. i know that a lot people have reported seeing triangluar objects; but i was wondering if anybody ever reported seeing what i saw.
content.summary: Large rectangual-shaped object, the size of a small car,the color of a deer

content.detailedDescription:
i was home frome work. having a beer on my front pourch, like i'd done on many night where the weather was good. i was a natural star gazer. not a proffesional astraunomer. i just used to look up and wonder if any other life is really out there. i got up from my chair, and started looking at the stars, because the night was so clear.
    i was looking up for about 3-4 min and i saw what looked like a star moving across the sky. i thought, is that a shooting star? no. i said shooting stars are burn by really fast and burn out. then i thought it's a sattelite orbiting the earth. but with that though the star started to move in the other direction. i thought that was funny. so i went into the house and told my wife at the time to come and take a look at this. after i had been watching for a while. she came out and we both relocated the star looking object in the sky and started looking at it. 
    some how we lost the star looking object in the sky, so we started to look around to see if we could relocate this small object. as we turned our heads and bodies completey to the  other direction we saw a rounded   triangular shaped object from the bottom. it was almost directly over us.It was a dark metalic lookng craft with circular looking vents maybe. they appeared to be in the closed position. this craft showed no lights at all. it was close enough to us that if i had taken my beer bottle and tossed it up i would have hit this object. the triangular shaped object moved by us very slowly, very close, and with no sound what so ever. all we heard was a slight russel of the leaves on the trees. we both ran in the house checked on our child and i don;t kow about my ex-wife now but i have never looked into the sky the same. i regret not having a video camera or something back then.  my time and date of sightting maybe 1998 or 1999 around sept-nov   it has been so long that i don't fully remember. lots of things have changed in my life since then and i just have not kept good records for anthing.  so thats my story. thanks. call me with any questions.
content.summary: Dark metal rounded triangular shape with what looked like 3 round circles in each point of the triangle like vents of some sort.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take a pic of the night sky, and as i took the picture a light in the sky flashed at the same time i took the picture.  there was not a star or any objects in the sky at the time.
content.summary: Taking pic of the dark sky

content.detailedDescription: My dad and two younger siblings were walking out into the backyard at 9:15 pm to camp out in a tent we had set up on august 29th when something caught my dad's eye and he said to look up. we all looked up into the sky to the south and saw 5 orange lights in a flying geese formation (v shape) one front light and one to the left and three to the right. it slowly moved to the south ( all lights moved together)for about 40 seconds then suddenly sped up and disappeared. there was no noise from the object which made it strange to us. we all were confused as to what it was and my siblings and i were afraid and decided not to camp out. is there a aircraft that would fit this description?
content.summary: 5 orange light in a flying geese formation traveling slowly for about 40 seconds then speeding up and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: On friday evening, the 14th, i set the alarm on my cell phone for 5:30 am.  at roughly around 4 am of the 15th my wife woke up and asked me if i had to work that day (sat.), i replied yes, but i didn't have to be to work until 7 am.  she took sasha (one of 3 pet dogs) downstairs and let them out for their morning potty (she remained downstairs on the couch).  at 5:30 am my phone alarm went off (i looked at the phone and it said it was 5:30 am).  i went downstairs and tuned the tv to the weather channel to get the "local on the 8's" (approx. 5:34 am).  i forgot to grab my ipod so i went back upstairs to retrieve it, subsequently missing the 6:38 time of local on the 8's.  i watched the 5:48 time, after which i kissed my wife goodbye (i awakened her briefly for that).  i estimate i left the house at about 5:50 am.  as i was driving north on blaine street, approaching highway 34, i noticed what i thought was a commercial jet heading east, off to my left (west), behind it was a white light following and passed the jet like it was standing still.  at that time i was thinking to myself that either i was witnessing a ufo event, or i was seeing an airforce jet that "doesn't exist".  as i approached the intersection i tried to "look past" the street lights there to continue observing the light, but what i saw was what appeared to be to white lights, kind of oval shaped, not blinding, but i couldn't see past them (at the time i just figured that it was the street lights, and continued on my way to a local restaurant that was about 2 miles from my home).  approximately 3 or 4 blocks from the restaurant my cell phone alarm went off, and when i pulled it from my front pocket (i was wearing bib overalls) it said it was 5:30 am.  i went on to the restaurant where my cell phone time matched the time at the restaurant.  it was several days later when i realized the the street lights were the sodium arc type and not white as i remembered.  there is no way that i can prove what happened, but i swear on a stack of bibles that is exactly what happened.
content.summary: Object passed a commercial jet, apparently came down to see me.

content.detailedDescription:
During our holiday in turkey last year (the 5th of august 2008 at 14:16 pm), at the end of a jeepsafari, we were riding up one of the hills surrounding alanya in the south of turkey. the driver stopped for a minute , almost halfway up the hill and i stood up in the jeep. i quickly took three pictures of the vieuw and we drove off. only now, after a year, i was looking at the internet to some sites about ufo pictures and thought well, look in my personal files, maybe... and to my surprise there is one and maybe more ( the following two pics after this one also show a little strange white light in the sky at different hights) caught my attention. i really can't explain why i noticed it before!! please take a look. it can be anything but i really can't explain what it is.
again, when i took the picture i didn't notice anything strange in the sky above alanya that day. the weather was very good, no clouds, 35 degrees celsius. only now this evening ( 1st of september 2009) i looked at the pics and noticed. i am open for suggestions. looking forward to your reaction....

with the kindest regards
content.summary: Not noticed when taken the picture...

content.detailedDescription:
I was initially hesitant to report this incident, since i'm wanting something closer to ground like the 7-2-9 craft.  but when i read report 18992, i had to document that my partner and i saw the exact same object as witnessed by the ct resident.  however, we saw this on 8-30-2009 at approx 945-950pm ct and they stated it was 8-31 at 9:45pm et.  perhaps they made a typo-error on the date?

we were standing in back of a strip mall on about 25th and capehart rd. in bellevue, ne.  as usual these days, we proceeded to scan the sky for anomalies.  a very bright silver-white flash caught my eye in the ne corner of sky in the area of cassiopeia.  like the ct witness, i thought it was likely just a plane strobe, but then realized there were no other standard nav lights.  i then asked her to check this thing out, and we both perceived it was moving steadily in a ne direction and pulsating at regular intervals.  unlike the ct person, we couldn't see any other regular pin point of light or other object d\t city lights.  my estimate was that it pulsated every 10-12 seconds for about 6-7 times, then left our view.  i have no idea at what height it traveled.  i would say it moved faster than most satellites i've seen or the iss, which was nowhere near us at that time.

this will probably be found to be a new type of satellite or maybe space debris.  but i've never seen one that flashed this brightly at regular intervals and there was no burn trail that one would expect with debris.  it was also odd that it didn't seem to cross the whole sky, just the ne quadrant.
content.summary: Very bright pulsating object moving s to ne

content.detailedDescription:
I was just going to bed when a light outside caught my eye. i went to the window and saw 2 lit objects dancing in the air towards the north. for a moment i thought they were remote control planes that people use in the park by my home. but i quickly realized their ability to maneuver matched no rc toys or human piloted craft. within moments, i admitted to myself that i was seeing 2 ufo's.

they were round and flat like a disk. their shape was defined by 6 greenish-bluish white lights along their edge. (the color of the lights is hard to describe because it was primarily white, with a lime green tint, but at the same time also a blue tint.) both were identical. as they turned, their lights spun, making them look like a wheel. they could roll on their side or parallel to the ground. however, when they executed a steep dive, their green lights vanished and a single, brilliant, rich, ruby-red light in the middle of the object came on instead, for the duration of the dive.

they were remarkably clear and defined, so i don't think they were far away. yet there was absolutely no sound. the feeling i got watching them was that they were being playful.

i grabbed my camera, and dashed outside, calling my roommate. she joined me and we watched them together. we agreed that they were ufo's. i took a series of pictures which shows the colors, but came out blurred:

http://www.Atlas9.Com/mykecollins_ufo_wolf/myke_collins_ufo_sighting.Htm

the 2 craft executed a set of maneuvers, sometimes mimicking each other and sometimes not. after about 5 minutes, they vanished by plunging suddenly towards the ground.
content.summary: Dual identical lighted disks

content.detailedDescription:
I was home alone when the event took place. the ufo looked to be about the length of a school bus. it was going about 20 mph when it stoped over
the corn field across. the craft shot down a beam and down a human shaped figure. i heared stolks break.
content.summary: It came from the tree line and went to the corn field and a beam came from the craft

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room when my sister started yelling my name shouting come here look it's a ufo so i got up from the sofa and opened my window she pointed into the sky that's when i notice the lights turning on and off. it look so close by and it was moving in circles when i first saw it we thought it was a plane but suddenly a plane past by and we knew it couldn't be a plane it looked like a saturn like object it looked really big and it seemed so close we followed it until it moved away and we couldn't see it anymore. we couldnt believe it we had just seen a ufo i tried to take pictures with my cell but i couldn't
content.summary: Had very colorful flashing lights that would turn on and off

content.detailedDescription: I was a teenager up early in the morning getting ready for my paper route before school. as usual it was a clear morning and i could see everything in the sky. i was looking at the moon and noticed 3 bright stars, one on the right, left, and bottom of the moon. as i was watching they all started to move in all different directions one after another. like you see in movies they started off slow and then went so fast they were gone in a few seconds. i couldn't believe what i saw i was very scared and could not believe what i just witnesed. it's been about 20 years and i have never forgot it.
content.summary: Three ufos around moon.
